defs: the end of a sari with which a woman covers her head and part of the face.
a man engaged in farming; an agriculturist; a farmer.
a sect among tribal people.
to grow and put forth young leaves (as a creeper).
= ಕುಡಿಯಿಕ್ಕು.
a woman of farming class.
(a plant) to advance the tip of a branch further.
the burning point of a wick that has turned black.
= ಕುಡಿಯ.
= ಕುಡಿಯ.
= ಕುಡಿಯಿಕ್ಕು.
the tender tip of a leave (as of betel-leaf, plantain leaf etc.).
to put forth new branch or branches.
to grow or develop.
= ಕುಡಿಯಿಕ್ಕು.
to flow over the brim or edge of; to over-flow.
a kind of net used for catching animals or birds.
the tender point of the abdomen.
= ಕುಡಿವಾಲು.
the tip of a tail.
a variety of dog that has pointed tail.
milk fit to drink or meant for it.
to work as a farmer, esp. under a feudal lord.
= ಕುಡಿಯಿಕ್ಕು.
= ಕುಡಿಹುಬ್ಬು.
the tip of a finger.
a ray of light.
to cause to drink.
to cause to give.
to turn, bend (oneself); to change one's position from being straight to being crooked; to become bent.
to cause to bend.

a man who habitually or to excess drinks alcoholic liquor; a habitual drunkard.
(in gen.) a man who drinks.
an unintelligent, slow-witted, foolish man.
the pointed, outer extremity of one's eye-brow.
a thin eye-brow (as of a child).

to turn over the possession or control of to someone without cost or exchange; make a gift of.

to give (a girl) in marriage to.
to bestow; to give mercifully.
to give the consequence (of an action).
to express (a thought, idea, feeling etc.) in words.
to hit, strike; to beat.
the quality or condition of being bent; crookedness.

(dial.) its pea; horse gram.
(dial.) the testicles of a tomcat.
a kind of grass.
a roof or roofing of straw, rushes, palm leaves, etc.; a thatch.
the cinnamom heron, Ardea cinnamonea.
a man who drinks alcoholic liquor as a matter of habit or to excess; a habitual drunkard.
to feed the young bird or birds by putting the food in small quantities in to their mouth (by the mother-bird).
to push or jab with a pointed object or beak; to poke; to peck; to prick with a sting.

the amount swallowed or can be swallowed at one time, esp. by a young bird.
the amount of a liquid taken at one drink.
drinking; given to the habit of drinking (alcoholic liquor).
grains, considered as wealth.
a sword with tooth-like edge or mace like weapon with hard metal projections.

to swallow; to gulp.
a small, round earthen or metal vessel.
a short, curved sword with an edge on the convex side; a scimitar.
any of long, thin bony fishes of Trichiuridae family, with a long, pointed tail and a wide, toothed mouth, found near the surface in tropical seas; a cutlass fish.
a sugarcane that is not straight.
= ಕುಡುಗೋಲು.
= ಕುಡುಗೋಲು.
to shake or toss about; to shake off (dust, powder, etc.).
hair that is or tends to curl; curly hair.
a very young girl (esp. below the age of seven years).
a hand that is bent; a crooked hand.
the act of giving (esp. gift, donation, etc.).
a neck that is bent, cast-down.

a short-handled farming tool with a semicircular blade, used for cutting corn, lopping or trimming; a sickle.

a short, sleeveless garment worn over the upper garment; a waistcoat.

the quality or condition of being bent; crookedness.

the quality or condition of being bent; crookedness.

an iron bar used to make a mark on the skin by burning with.
a stick or bar used in dressing cotton.
a tail that is bent (as that of a dog).
an old measure of grain (equal to one fourth of Prastha and containing twelve handfuls or half a seer).

a tribal sect of the hilly regions of Karnāṭaka.

the moon, when it appears to have one concave edge and one convex edge.

a short, sleeveless garment worn over the upper garment; a waistcoat.
a knee-length, collarless, loose shirt worn over pyjamas by men; kurta.
(dial.) a kind of social wasp of Vespidae family; a hornet.
a bud about to open; an opening bud.
name of a meter that has fourteen syllables.
a continuous and vertical structure usu. of brick or stone, having little width in proportion to its length and height and esp. enclosing, protecting or dividing a space or supporting a roof; a wall.
the tree Holarrhena antidysentrica of Apocynaceae family.
the potherb Amaranthus oleraceus of Amaranthaceae family.
a dead body (esp. of a human being); a corpse.
a strong, unpleasant or offensive smell; a stench; a stink.
a thrusting or throwing weapon with a pointed usu. steel tip and a long shaft; a spear; a lance.
a place for the burial or cremation of the dead; a burial ground; a crematory.
a sub-sect among farming caste.
a sect among farming community.
to be revengeful in spirit; to be inclined to seek vengeance; to be vindictive.
a continuing and bitter hate or ill will; deep spite or malice; rancour.
to move up and down frequently.
to play or frolic in a boisterous lively way; to make merry; to jump.
to move the body and feet in rhythm ordinarily to music; to dance.

ಕುಣಿದಾಟ kuṇidāṭa a gay, playful jump or leap; an activity engaged in for amusement, expression of one's joy etc.; ಕುಣಿದಾಡಿಸು kuṇidāḍisu to cause to jump or play in boisterous or lively way; ಕುಣಿದಾಡು kuṇidāḍu to jump or play in boisterous or lively way; to caper; to gambol; ಕುಣಿಯಲಾರದವಳು ನೆಲಡೊಂಕು ಎಂದಳು kuṇiyalāradavaḷu nela ḍonku eṇḍaḷu (prov.) (prov.) one blames others, the situation, etc. for one's own failures or inefficiency; a bad workman blames his tools; ಕುಣಿಯುತ್ತಾ ಇರು kuṇiyuttā iru to be very (often, too) enthusiastic; ಕುಣಿಯುವ ಕಾಲಿಗೆ ಗೆಜ್ಜೆಕಟ್ಟು kuṇiyuva kālige gejjekaṭṭu (prov.) to encourage a person who is already intensely enthusiastic or devoted for a cause.
a hole or cavity in the ground; a pit; a depressed part or place; a hollow.
a hollow place within something; a cavity.
a man with a crippled, withered or crooked arm.

its wood.

the time of day from noon to evening; afternoon.

a large pile of straw, hay, etc., esp. one neatly arranged, as in a conical form, for outdoor storage; a stack; ಕುತ್ತರೆಹಾಕು kuttare hāku to pile straw, hay, etc.up neatly in conical form; to stack.

the part of the body connecting the head to the shoulders; the neck.
the part of a shirt, dress, etc. round or close to the neck.

ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಕೊಯ್ kuttige koy to ruin another by betraying; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಗುಂಡುಕಲ್ಲು kuttige guṇḍukallu an obstacle, hindrance or difficulty standing in the way of progress; a stumbling block; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊ kuttigege kaṭṭiko to take the responsibility of (esp. of something unwanted); 2. to marry (against one's wish); ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಕಟ್ಟು kuttigege kaṭṭu to pass on the responsibility to someone (usu. against his willingness to take up); 2. to cause to marry (usu. against one's wish); ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ತರು kuttigege taru to cause to face a danger or calamity; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಬರು kuttigege baru (a responsibility, liability, etc. ) to be imposed on; 2. (a risk, dangerous situation) to happen as to put one's life, job etc. in peril; to become critical; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಬೀಳು kuttigege bīḷu = ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಬರು; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ತನಕ ಬರು kuttige tanaka baru = ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಗೆ ಬರು; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಹಿಚುಕು kuttige hicuku = ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಹಿಸುಕು; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಹಿಸುಕು kuttige hisuku to kill by squeezing the throat as with the hands, a noose, etc., so as to shut off the breath; to strangle (another to death); 2. to create a very difficult situation to avoid another's progress, development, etc.; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕುಳಿತಿರು kuttigeya mēle kuḷitiru to pressurise or persuade unduly; ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಕೊಯ್ಯುವ ಊರಲ್ಲಿ ಸುಲಿದು ಬಿಟ್ಟದ್ದೇ ಗುಣ kuttige koyyuva ūralli sulidu biṭṭddē guṇa (prov.) in a state where cannibalism is the rule, robbery is a gracious act; ಚಿನ್ನದ ಚೂರಿ ಎಂದು ಕುತ್ತಿಗೆ ಕೊಯಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಬಹುದೆ? cinnada cūri endu kuttige koyisikoḷḷabahude? (prov.) may be the diamond is precious, but a poison too.

a man who cuts throats; a murderer.
(fig.) a treacherous man.
to poke or pierce heavily with a sharp instrument.

to poke or pierce heavily with a sharp instrument, 2) to have, sustain a wound or wounds from the poking of a sharp instrument.

to cause to pierce, jab or stab.
to beat, strike.

to pierce or wound with a (usu. short) pointed tool or weapon as a knife or dagger.
to strike or beat repeatedly with the hand or a weapon.

to wear; to put on.

ಕುತ್ತಿ ಕುತ್ತಿ ಕೇಳು kutti kutti kēḷu to ask, enquire repeatedly, persuasively; ಕುತ್ತಿಕೊಳ್ಳು kuttikoḷḷu to stab, pierce oneself with; 2. to thrust, hang, lightly or plant (something on oneself, as to insert a dagger into one's waist-belt).
a stroke; a blow; a hit.

erected hair (as from excessive joy).
